verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Then came בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָ֨עֵדָ֤ה <S%H5712><s%> [even] the whole congregation מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> into the desert צִן֙ <S%H6790><s%> of Zin בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> in the first וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> abode הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people בְּקָדֵ֑שׁ <S%H6946><s%> in Kadesh וַתָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> died שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there מִרְיָ֔ם <S%H4813><s%> and Miriam וַתִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> there and was buried שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> And there was no water לָעֵדָ֑ה <S%H5712><s%> for the congregation וַיִּקָּ֣הֲל֔וּ <S%H6950><s%> and they gathered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> themselves together against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> and against Aaron

וַיָּ֥רֶב <S%H7378><s%> chode הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> with Moses וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and spake לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying וְל֥וּ <S%H3863><s%> Would God that גָוַ֛עְנוּ <S%H1478><s%> we had died בִּגְוַ֥ע <S%H1478><s%> died אַחֵ֖ינוּ <S%H251><s%> when our brethren לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְלָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> Why הֲבֵאתֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> And why have ye brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> the congregation יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> into this wilderness הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this לָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> should die שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we וּבְעִירֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H1165><s%> that we and our cattle

וְלָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> Why הֶֽעֱלִיתֻ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> And wherefore have ye made us to come up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt לְהָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> to bring אֹתָ֔נוּ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> country הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> us in unto this evil הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this לֹ֣א ׀ <S%H3808><s%> not מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> country זֶ֗רַע <S%H2233><s%> of seed וּתְאֵנָ֤ה <S%H8384><s%> or of figs וְגֶ֙פֶן֙ <S%H1612><s%> or of vines וְרִמּ֔וֹן <S%H7416><s%> or of pomegranates וּמַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> neither [is] there any water אַ֖יִן <S%H369><s%> nor לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8354><s%> to drink

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> went מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence הַקָּהָ֗ל <S%H6951><s%> of the assembly אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֙תַח֙ <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> and they fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> upon their faces וַיֵּרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> appeared כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּטֶּ֗ה <S%H4294><s%> the rod וְהַקְהֵ֤ל <S%H6950><s%> and gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֵדָה֙ <S%H5712><s%> thou the assembly אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> together thou and Aaron אָחִ֔יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother וְדִבַּרְתֶּ֧ם <S%H1696><s%> and speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַסֶּ֛לַע <S%H5553><s%> ye unto the rock לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> before their eyes וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and it shall give forth מֵימָ֑יו <S%H4325><s%> his water וְהוֹצֵאתָ֨ <S%H3318><s%> and thou shalt bring forth לָהֶ֥ם מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> to them water מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַסֶּ֔לַע <S%H5553><s%> out of the rock וְהִשְׁקִיתָ֥ <S%H8248><s%> drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> the congregation וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּעִירָֽם׃ <S%H1165><s%> and their beasts

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> the rod מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he צִוָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H6680><s%> as he commanded

וַיַּקְהִ֜לוּ <S%H6950><s%> gathered מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> the congregation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> together פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> together before הַסָּ֑לַע <S%H5553><s%> the rock וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said לָהֶ֗ם שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> unto them Hear נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now הַמֹּרִ֔ים <S%H4784><s%> now ye rebels הֲמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַסֶּ֣לַע <S%H5553><s%> the rock הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of this נוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> must we fetch לָכֶ֖ם מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> you water

וַיָּ֨רֶם <S%H7311><s%> lifted up מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַיַּ֧ךְ <S%H5221><s%> he smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסֶּ֛לַע <S%H5553><s%> the rock בְּמַטֵּ֖הוּ <S%H4294><s%> and with his rod פַּעֲמָ֑יִם <S%H6471><s%> twice וַיֵּצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> came out מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> and the water רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> abundantly וַתֵּ֥שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> drank הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> and the congregation וּבְעִירָֽם׃ <S%H1165><s%> and their beasts ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַהֲרֹן֒ <S%H175><s%> and Aaron יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not הֶאֱמַנְתֶּ֣ם <S%H539><s%> Because ye believed בִּ֔י לְהַ֨קְדִּישֵׁ֔נִי <S%H6942><s%> me not to sanctify לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> me in the eyes בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָבִ֙יאוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> therefore ye shall not bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקָּהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> this congregation הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have given לָהֶֽם׃

הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> This [is] מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> the water מְרִיבָ֔ה <S%H4809><s%> of Meribah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> because רָב֥וּ <S%H7378><s%> strove בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> because the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וַיִּקָּדֵ֖שׁ <S%H6942><s%> and he was sanctified בָּֽם׃ ס

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses מַלְאָכִ֛ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers מִקָּדֵ֖שׁ <S%H6946><s%> from Kadesh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אֱד֑וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אָחִ֣יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Thou knowest אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַתְּלָאָ֖ה <S%H8513><s%> all the travail אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that מְצָאָֽתְנוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> that hath befallen

וַיֵּרְד֤וּ <S%H3381><s%> went down אֲבֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1><s%> How our fathers מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וַנֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and we have dwelt בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> time רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> a long וַיָּרֵ֥עוּ <S%H7489><s%> vexed לָ֛נוּ מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וְלַאֲבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> us and our fathers

וַנִּצְעַ֤ק <S%H6817><s%> And when we cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> he heard קֹלֵ֔נוּ <S%H6963><s%> our voice וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent מַלְאָ֔ךְ <S%H4397><s%> an angel וַיֹּצִאֵ֖נוּ <S%H3318><s%> and hath brought us forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> now behold אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we בְקָדֵ֔שׁ <S%H6946><s%> and behold we [are] in Kadesh עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> a city קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> in the uttermost גְבוּלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> of thy border

נַעְבְּרָה־ <S%H5674><s%> Let us pass נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please בְאַרְצֶ֗ךָ <S%H776><s%> I pray thee through thy country לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> We will not נַעֲבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> we will not pass בְּשָׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> through the fields וּבְכֶ֔רֶם <S%H3754><s%> or through the vineyards וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> even נִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H8354><s%> neither will we drink מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> [of] the water בְאֵ֑ר <S%H875><s%> of the wells דֶּ֧רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [high] way הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> by the king's נֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not נִטֶּה֙ <S%H5186><s%> we will not turn יָמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> to the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֔אול <S%H8040><s%> nor to the left עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after נַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> until we have passed גְּבוּלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> thy borders

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> and אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> And Edom לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> unto him Thou shalt not pass בִּ֑י פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> thee with the sword אֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> by me lest I come out לִקְרָאתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7125><s%> against

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> about בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּֽמְסִלָּ֣ה <S%H4546><s%> by the high way נַעֲלֶה֒ <S%H5927><s%> unto him We will go וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if מֵימֶ֤יךָ <S%H4325><s%> of thy water נִשְׁתֶּה֙ <S%H8354><s%> drink אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> and וּמִקְנַ֔י <S%H4735><s%> and if I and my cattle וְנָתַתִּ֖י <S%H5414><s%> will pay מִכְרָ֑ם <S%H4377><s%> price רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> but אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> without דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> for it I will only without [doing] any thing בְּרַגְלַ֥י <S%H7272><s%> on my feet אֶֽעֱבֹֽרָה׃ <S%H5674><s%> [else] go through

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲבֹ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> Thou shalt not go through וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> came out אֱדוֹם֙ <S%H123><s%> And Edom לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <S%H7125><s%> against בְּעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people כָּבֵ֖ד <S%H3515><s%> him with much וּבְיָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָֽה׃ <S%H2389><s%> and with a strong

וַיְמָאֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H3985><s%> refused אֱד֗וֹם <S%H123><s%> Thus Edom נְתֹן֙ <S%H5414><s%> to give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> passage בִּגְבֻל֑וֹ <S%H1366><s%> through his border וַיֵּ֥ט <S%H5186><s%> turned away יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> wherefore Israel מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and פ

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> journeyed מִקָּדֵ֑שׁ <S%H6946><s%> from Kadesh וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> [even] the whole congregation הֹ֥ר <S%H2023><s%> Hor הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> unto mount

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron בְּהֹ֣ר <S%H2023><s%> Hor הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> by the coast אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֱד֖וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying
